name: Bionic Rejection
desc: Your body is adjusting to a new bionic.  It makes you intensely uncomfortable, and disrupts your ability to focus.
apply_message: Your body screams in protest to the new bionic!
remove_message: You've broken in your new bionic.

name: Immune Response
desc: Aided by your bionics, your immune system is aggressively attacking a foreign agent.  This is very uncomfortable.
